DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate application Negative AV Hysteresis ( NAVH ) improve electrical synchrony MultiPoint Pacing ( MPP ) Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy ( CRT ) patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Application Negative Atrioventricular Hysteresis Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy With MultiPoint Pacing
DOC.criteria: Scheduled implantation MPPenabled SJM Quadripolar CRT Pacing System QRS duration > 140 m Left bundle branch block document Ability provide inform consent study participation Willing comply study evaluation requirement At least 18 year age Resting ventricular rate > 100 bpm Intrinsic PR interval > 300 m Paroxysmal persistent atrial tachycardia atrial fibrillation document A recent myocardial infarction , ablation , drug intoxication , electrolyte imbalance , condition within last 90 day would contraindicate CRT program change opinion investigator Women pregnant plan become pregnant study
